PHRASE.LANG:
The MorphMask Bundle for Women contains a great selection of MorphMasks™.
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) MorphMask - Green Original (Women)
 (2) MorphMask - Mardi Gras (Women)
 (3) MorphMask - Orange Original (Women)
 (4) MorphMask - Purple Original (Women)
 (5) MorphMask - Skeletonblack (Women)
 (6) MorphMask - Tie Dye (Women)
 
 ※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories. [#Legal]

 Ce lot contient :

 (2) MorphMask - Mardi gras (femme)
 (3) MorphMask - Orange d'origine (femme)
 (4) MorphMask - Violet d'origine (femme)

 (6) MorphMask - Tie and Dye (femme)
